data.actual_result: The first icon only shows the first letter ehich is  the second icon also shows any sign letters/numbers (like "_)7$") in the icon regardless if you separated by space button or  sure if this should be like this.
data.expected_result: Both of the icons should be showing the first letter of each word/sign seperated by space button.
data.short_description: Using signs such as "€*¡®>" in your server's name,will make the server's auto-generated icon work in a different way if you don't upload your own image for as the server's icon.
data.steps_to_repro: - Scroll down on the left side and tap the + button the create a new server. - Enter any regular long name for the server using only normal 't choose any icon for the server. - Create another server but this time also use different signsor numbers in the  your Android keyboard you shoud click on the "?123" button to access those signs. - Compare the two icons.
